column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Christina - Thanks for your review. We appreciate your feedback on our Vegetable Soup Ramen
column2: though I would strongly recommend giving the Spicy Vegan Ramen a try if you're able. We have received a fair amount of strong feedback on the Spicy Vegan Ramen
column3: and I sincerely hope we can earn a higher rating from you if/when you give it a try.
